TITLE: Sending Push Notifications with PyAPNs2
DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to send push notifications using PyAPNs2. It includes examples of creating a payload, initializing the client with certificate-based authentication, sending a single notification, and sending multiple notifications in a batch.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pr0ger/pyapns2/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: python
CODE:
```
from apns2.client import APNsClient
from apns2.payload import Payload

token_hex = 'b5bb9d8014a0f9b1d61e21e796d78dccdf1352f23cd32812f4850b87'
payload = Payload(alert="Hello World!", sound="default", badge=1)
topic = 'com.example.App'
client = APNsClient('key.pem', use_sandbox=False, use_alternative_port=False)
client.send_notification(token_hex, payload, topic)

# To send multiple notifications in a batch
Notification = collections.namedtuple('Notification', ['token', 'payload'])
notifications = [Notification(payload=payload, token=token_hex)]
client.send_notification_batch(notifications=notifications, topic=topic)
```

TITLE: Using Token-Based Authentication with PyAPNs2
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet shows how to use token-based authentication with PyAPNs2. It demonstrates creating TokenCredentials with the necessary authentication details and initializing the APNsClient with these credentials.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pr0ger/pyapns2/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: python
CODE:
```
from apns2.credentials import TokenCredentials

auth_key_path = 'path/to/auth_key'
auth_key_id = 'app_auth_key_id'
team_id = 'app_team_id'
token_credentials = TokenCredentials(auth_key_path=auth_key_path, auth_key_id=auth_key_id, team_id=team_id)
client = APNsClient(credentials=token_credentials, use_sandbox=False)
client.send_notification_batch(notifications=notifications, topic=topic)
```

TITLE: Installing PyAPNs2 using pip
DESCRIPTION: This command installs the PyAPNs2 library using pip, the Python package installer.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pr0ger/pyapns2/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
$ pip install apns2
```

TITLE: Setting Up Development Environment for PyAPNs2
DESCRIPTION: These shell commands demonstrate how to set up a development environment for PyAPNs2. It includes cloning the repository, creating a virtual environment, and installing dependencies.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pr0ger/pyapns2/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
# Clone the source code.
git clone https://github.com/Pr0Ger/PyAPNs2.git
cd PyAPNs2
# Create a virtualenv and install dependencies.
virtualenv venv
. venv/bin/activate
pip install -e .[tests]
```

TITLE: Running Tests with Multiple Python Versions using tox
DESCRIPTION: These commands demonstrate how to use tox to run tests for PyAPNs2 with multiple Python versions. It includes installing different Python versions and setting them up for use with tox.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pr0ger/pyapns2/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
pyenv install 3.5.6; pyenv install 3.6.7; pyenv install 3.7.1; pyenv install 3.8.0
pyenv local 3.8.0 3.7.1 3.6.7 3.5.6
pip install tox
tox
```
